entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Becoming mainly cloudy late in the morning. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
